summary: Snow queen casts a curse on her mirror making people see the worst in themselves.
cast: Ivan Okhlobystin|Anna Shurochkina|Igor Kharlamov|Anna Khilkevich|Olga Zubkova|Fyodor Dobronravov|Aleksandr Uman|Igor Bortnik|Aleksey Likhnitskiy|Roman Yunusov|Diomid Vinogradov|Mikhail Tikhonov|Aleksandr Gudkov|Ramilya Iskander|Valeriya Nikolaeva|Dee Bradley Baker|Valeriy Ivakov|Vladimir Chuprikov|Olga Shorokhova|Sean Bean|Jeff Bennett|JB Blanc|Bill Chott|Sharlto Copley|Sara Cravens|Pat Fraley|Isabelle Fuhrman|Miles Hoff|Tyler Merna|Candi Milo|Nick Tate|Bella Thorne|Carrie Wampler
title: Orm en el reino de las nieves
